Automation Rule

Remove a automation rule from account

DELETE

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

automation\_rules

/

{id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/automation_rules/{id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
This response does not have an example.
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/remove-a-automation-rule-from-account#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/remove-a-automation-rule-from-account#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/automation-rule/remove-a-automation-rule-from-account#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The ID of the automation rule to be deleted

#### Response

200

200403404

Success
